author: jon
msg: rewrote the cvs on unix page to make more sense and not force people
to use tunnels because on unix, it is easier to simply set the CVS_RSH
also fixed links to the utilities

author: jon
msg: updated the velocity.jar to reflect changes to anakia to fix
the encoding issue. what happens is that the XMLOutputter defaults
to UTF-8 instead of 8859-1. now anakia will use whatever is defined
in the velocity.properties for "template.encoding" and defaults to
thanks to jason hunter for explaining this.
